author: Diane Daniel
title: Expanding Cruise Options Through the Gal치pagos Islands
text:
The small-ship cruise operator Ecoventura, known for its expedition cruising through the Gal치pagos Islands , is expanding into a higher level of luxury service with the introduction of its fourth ship, the MV Origin.
